sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground, PropsTable } from 'docz'
import Button from './Button'

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"button"}}>{`Button`}</MDXTag>
<PropsTable of={Button} />
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"type"}}>{`Type`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`button`}</MDXTag>{` `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`anchor`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"button-1"}}>{`button`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={1} __code={'<Button theme=\"red\">Button</Button>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,Button}}>
  <Button theme="red">Button</Button>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"anchor"}}>{`anchor`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`href, target 속성을 `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`<a>`}</MDXTag>{`태그를 사용하듯 추가하면 된다.`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={2} __code={'<Button type=\"anchor\" href=\"http://www.encar.com\" target=\"_blank\" theme=\"red\">\n  Anchor\n</Button>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,Button}}>
  <Button type="anchor" href="http://www.encar.com" target="_blank" theme="red">Anchor</Button>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"inline"}}>{`Inline`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"true"}}>{`true`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={3} __code={'<Button theme=\"red\">버튼</Button>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,Button}}>
  <Button theme="red">버튼</Button>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"false"}}>{`false`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={4} __code={'<Button theme=\"red\" inline={false}>\n  버튼\n</Button>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,Button}}>
  <Button theme="red" inline={false}>버튼</Button>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"theme"}}>{`Theme`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`red`}</MDXTag>{` `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`white`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"red"}}>{`red`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={5} __code={'<Button theme=\"red\">버튼</Button>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,Button}}>
  <Button theme="red">버튼</Button>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"white"}}>{`white`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={6} __code={'<Button theme=\"white\">취소</Button>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,Button}}>
  <Button theme="white">취소</Button>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"size"}}>{`Size`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`30`}</MDXTag>{` `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`40`}</MDXTag>{` `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`50`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"30"}}>{`30`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={7} __code={'<Button size={30} theme=\"white\">\n  작은거\n</Button>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,Button}}>
  <Button size={30} theme="white">작은거</Button>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"40"}}>{`40`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={8} __code={'<Button size={40} theme=\"white\">\n  보통\n</Button>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,Button}}>
  <Button size={40} theme="white">보통</Button>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"50"}}>{`50`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={9} __code={'<Button size={50} theme=\"white\">\n  큰거\n</Button>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,Button}}>
  <Button size={50} theme="white">큰거</Button>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"event"}}>{`Event`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"onclickevent"}}>{`onClick(event)`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={10} __code={'<Button theme=\"white\" onClick={e => alert(\'클릭\')}>\n  클릭!\n</Button>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,Button}}>
  <Button theme="white" onClick={e => alert('클릭')}>클릭!</Button>
</Playground>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
